scripts.test: npm --prefix ./store-pro run build-test && npm --prefix ./store-pro-react run build-test && npm --prefix ./store-pro-svelte run test && npm --prefix ./store-pro-angular run build-test
scripts.install: npm --prefix ./store-pro install && npm --prefix ./store-pro-angular/test install && npm install --prefix ./store-pro-angular install && npm --prefix ./store-pro-react install && npm --prefix ./store-pro-svelte install
